parameters: D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]バトルの説明をしていくね 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]最初はドローから始まるよ 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]The first starts with a card draw 30
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]You can draw two cards from the deck 30
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]カードの設置準備をしよう 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]Let's prepare for card placement The 25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]行動順番は図の順番になるよ 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]character's action order will be the order of 25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]主人公の最大HPが多い方から 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]display, the action will start in order from the 25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]配置は前衛後衛に分かれ 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]The arrangement of cards is divided into 25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]前衛の方が狙われやすくなるよ 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]avant-garde and rearguard, and it is easier  25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]for the avant-garde to be targeted. 25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]The number on the card is the turn until it 25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]左上の数値が待機値(召喚可能までの待機) 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]can be summoned in the upper right, the 25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]number in the lower left is the attack power, 25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]and the number on the right is HP. 25
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]カードが召喚可能になるよ 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]Place the cards by dragging and 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]長押ししながら移動だよ 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]ユニットカードの場合は 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]枠内に移動して離すと召喚！ 32
D_TEXT \ow[1]\oc[rgb(230,177,170)]\C[20]全ての配置が完了したら 32
